div.h1: The Town of Neenah Welcomes You

div.h2: Urban Living in a Rural Setting

div.h5: Residents love the small rural feel of living in the Town with quiet neighborhoods and lakefront property, while still having convenient access to entertainment, shopping, restaurants, and unlimited recreational activities. The Town of Neenah currently has one of the lowest tax rates in the Fox Valley area at $0.9958 per $1,000 of assessed value.

div.p: Urban Living in a Rural Setting Residents love the small rural feel of living in the Town with quiet neighborhoods and lakefront property, while still having convenient access to entertainment, shopping, restaurants, and unlimited recreational activities. The Town of Neenah currently has one of the lowest tax rates in the Fox Valley area at $0.9958 per $1,000 of assessed value.
